titleStmt.title: Eucharistia, or, A grateful acknowledgement of God's goodness in preserving our most gracious King William and for the success of his arms this last summer : deliver'd in a sermon to a country-auditory on the 22d of September 1695, being the day appointed by authority for a public thanksgiving / by William Corbin.
titleStmt.author: Corbin, William.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge University.
